DOC.brief_summary: The trial is performed to assess efficacy and safety of a purified standardised bee venom preparation in bee venom allergy
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of a Purified Standardised Bee Venom Preparation
DOC.criteria: History of bee venom allergy, Positive RAST for bee venom, Positive skin prick test for bee venom Serious chronic diseases
